description: One of the biggest concerns of people wanting to become a wholesaler is "where do i get the contract?" This course will provide the contract that you can use in all 50 states and will give you the instructions on how to use it. The Assignment of Contract is what wholesalers use to make money in real estate. Learn all the components of the contract and when to use it. Also get 2 bonuses, including using the Double Closing as another tool to make more money.
title: The Wholesaler's Assignment of Contract
